product_name: EssenceLash Princess False Lash Effect Waterproof Mascara
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackEssence Lash Princess False Lash Effect Mascara Waterproof ensures lashes never have to worry about smudging or flaking while providing a false lash effect!
details: DetailsFeaturesWaterproof mascara formulaFree from smudging or flakingFeatures iconic conical-shaped fiber wandMascara provides length, volume, and a false lash effectCruelty freeOphthalmologist testedFormulated WithoutAnimal byproductsFragranceOilParabensItem 2547673How To UseUsing essence Lash PRINCESS false lash effect mascara waterproof, start at the base of the lash line and wiggle wand back and forth, adding as many coats as you like until desired length and volume is achieved. Remove mascara with essence Remove Like A Boss Waterproof Eye Make-up Remover.IngredientsIsododecane, Cera Microcristallina (Microcrystalline Wax), Aqua (Water), Vp/Eicosene Copolymer, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Talc, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Propylene Glycol, Silica, Sorbitan Isostearate, Panthenol, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Propylene Carbonate, Trimethyl Pentanyl Diisobutyrate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides).
how_to_use: Using essence Lash PRINCESS false lash effect mascara waterproof, start at the base of the lash line and wiggle wand back and forth, adding as many coats as you like until desired length and volume is achieved. Remove mascara with essence Remove Like A Boss Waterproof Eye Make-up Remover.

reviews.headline: Works soo well
reviews.comments: This is such a good waterproof mascara and the price makes it such a steal. It makes my lashes super long and for me, it doesn't clump. It's kinda dry, but the effect and the fact that it's super waterproof make it worth it. Definitely my new favorite mascara.

reviews.headline: You get what you pay for!
reviews.comments: Using millecular make up remover, I still wake up with black eyes! I don't know how much harder I need to scrub my eyes or should I use SOAP to continue to wash my eyes before bed. Grrr! I'm going to try to exchange/return it!

reviews.headline: I wouldn't purchase again
reviews.comments: Is definitely waterproof, but it runs and smudges everywhere I wouldn't purchase this item again I personally do not recommend.

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: I tried the product based on several beauty influencers rave reviews.  I had the opposite experience with the product smearing under my eyes for a "racoon" effect.

reviews.headline: Not sure what happened
reviews.comments: The color is nice I applied the waterproof mascara but it seems like it didn't dry or I got a bad one. I was sweating and ended up with mascara all around my eyes. I looked like a raccoon.

reviews.headline: NOT waterproof or smudge proof
reviews.comments: This mascara does give a nice false lash affect and holds a curl decently. If you tend to need waterproof to hold a curl, the curl does not last well. If you tend to have a problem with smudging underneath the eyes throughout the day, this is not a mascara for you.

reviews.headline: Best on the Market
reviews.comments: I have tried many mascaras and this is the best by far! It works great for my thin lashes and doesn't budge. I recently bought it in brown and I am obsessed.

reviews.headline: This didn't hold up as expected
reviews.comments: Not effective for continued play in the water

reviews.headline: True to name
reviews.comments: This false lash product is definitely true to its name.  My lashes have never looked so good and it gives that false lash look . Kudos to Essence

reviews.headline: Use it everyday
reviews.comments: I love this mascara I use it everyday. It holds the curl in my lash. It is affordable but it is extremely hard to take off. I can never get in fully off.

reviews.headline: Great value
reviews.comments: Love the way it lengthens my lashes without clumping. Waterproofing is a real plus.

reviews.headline: SO GOOD
reviews.comments: I HAVE NO WORDS JUST BY IT ITS SO CHEAP AND ISNT TOO OVER THE TOP UNLESS I WANT IT TO BE SHES PERFECT

reviews.headline: Long lasting!
reviews.comments: This mascara adds volume and length to my lashes and stays on! I wore it to an outdoor concert in the pouring rain for 3 hours and it stayed on, didn't run or flake, and kept my lashes looking flawless. My trick for easy application is warming the (closed!) tube up by running under warm water before applying; it glides on like the first time, every time!

reviews.headline: Works great, would buy again!
reviews.comments: Stays on great in water and you can't beat the cost.  Have purchased this product several times and will continue to do so.  I feel it applies better than some higher priced luxury brands.

reviews.headline: A new staple!
reviews.comments: I just put this mascara through the ultimate test during a week long vacation in Turks and Caicos. I'm someone whose eyes get irritated by most mascaras (I could only use tubing before this). This mascara held a curl, didnt smudge and didn't irritate my eyes at all! I'll definitely be adding this to my regular routine.

reviews.headline: 10/10 recommend
reviews.comments: Will definitely be buying again. My lashes look great!

reviews.headline: Waterproof Essence Mascara
reviews.comments: I just tried this when going on the boat, but it did end up running black a little bit. Overall, i still have length on my lashes and it held up mostly but again did have it run a bit. Pretty good though.

reviews.headline: Perfect!
reviews.comments: This is the only brand of mascara that I use.

reviews.headline: Best bargain out there!
reviews.comments: I have fine, thin lashes that are practically invisible without mascara.  If I want a natural look, 2 coats of this and I'm good to go.  Such a great mascara for the price!  Every time I try a new mascara, I end up going back to Essence.

reviews.headline: Works well
reviews.comments: It is a bit chunky but is waterproof and keeps lashes standing all day

media.headline: Absolutely perfect for my every day look

faceoff_positive.comments:
I have tried so many different mascaras and had to throw so many away.
When I recently ordered this Waterproof Essence Mascara, I fell in love.
This mascara has all PROS and no Cons. I have used it for a month so far and my love has only been growing.
Pros:
Does not run if my eyes water.
Does not burn my eyes.
Makes my lashes EXTRA SUPER LONG looking.
Stays put on lashes until removed with makeup remover.
VERY REASONABLE PRICE.
VERY important to me is that it is cruelty free....ALWAYS a plus.
I have used all price ranges of mascara from ridiculously expensive to drug store brands. This is the first that has not disappointed.
This review WAS NOT PAID FOR. I just love this product.
faceoff_positive.headline: Wonderful Perfect Mascara!

faceoff_negative.comments: When I opened it I noticed that the brush collected an excessive amount of mascara. When I put it on my lashes clump. Some of my eyelashes curled but some of them didn't. The ends of my lashes didn't get any mascara. It is really waterproof unless you smudge it. Overall it's ok but I don't recommend buying it.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not the best

rollup.name: Lash Princess False Lash Effect Waterproof Mascara
